attributes.action: stop British members of the public from serving in the IDF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hundreds of British Jews fly to Israel every year and serve with the IDF , this may include duties on occupied land therefore breaking international law.If a Palestinian flew to the occupied lands and fought for his lands freedom he or she would be deemed a terrorist yet British Jews are allowed to join an army which has occupied and still occupys the lands of three neighbouring countries.There should be one rule for all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
